content: adorn your mantle with this homey crochet stocking working straight from the ball in double_crochet allows the gorgeous hues of red heart super saver bitty stripes to shine shifting through the shades as you work your way through the center of each motif with a solid border in red heart super saver as the perfect frame the colors really shine simply seam the motifs together and follow the diagram to cleverly fold the stocking into shape customize a unique version for every family member to make your holiday extra special materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a soft white 0316 1 ball or 221 yds/202 m red heart® bitty stripes™ 10 oz/283 g 515 yds/471 m contrast b unicorn mane 0115 1 ball or 230 yds/210 5 m measurement approx 16 40 5 cm long excluding hanging loop gauges 13 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 10 cm motif = 5 12 5 cm from point to point
